## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description | Type                                                                               | Default              |
| ---------- | ---------- | ----------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------- |
| `disabled` | `disabled` |             | `boolean`                                                                          | `false`              |
| `label`    | `label`    |             | `string`                                                                           | `undefined`          |
| `size`     | `size`     |             | `ButtonSize.lg \| ButtonSize.md \| ButtonSize.xl`                                  | `ButtonSize.md`      |
| `type`     | `type`     |             | `ButtonType.icon \| ButtonType.link \| ButtonType.primary \| ButtonType.secondary` | `ButtonType.primary` |
